column1: # NGR is the rectory in Huggate where the observer Reverend Thomas Rankin, who was vicar/curate at Huggate church, and is quoted as living in the rectory.
# The quoted elevation (650ft) does not match; the quoted elevation is that for the rectory from OS maps.
# Sep 1846 has two readings of 5.62 and 0.62 and annual totals of 38.61 and 33.61, not all in the original hand.
# These readings have been deleted because of the doubt. 5.62 looks very unlikely given nearby observations, but too much uncertainty.
